text: Transcona(Cond,label; Jabely vtable frable) = case Cond of Exp, relop Exp, | 1 = newvar() 1 = newvar() code; = Transzyp(Exp, , table.ftable,1) codey = Transzyp(Exp», viable.fiable, 1) op = transop(getopname(relop)) codey ++codes++[IF 1y op 1y THEN label, ELSE label;] Ep 1 = newvar() ‘ codey = Transzp(Exp, viable, fiable.1) codey ++[1F I 0 THEN label, ELSE label,] .
